phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
To retrieve the magic stone that the Eye of the Midnight Sun is after,
Asta and the others headed for the Underwater Temple.
But a strong flow of mana caused powerful currents,
making it impossible for anyone to go in.
The only time the mana would weaken was in a week, on the night of the full moon.
Yami ordered Noelle to master a water spell that would allow them
to move through the water by then.
Asta and a mysterious girl named Kahono encouraged Noelle
when she was unable to control her powers.
The rest of the Black Bulls also joined in.
They all acknowledged me and gave me a mission.
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Cradle!
You have got some great friends!
They are the ones who should be cheering for you in the end!
Well, I will be waiting for you, Noelle!
Tonight's finally the night of the full moon.
The mana deep within these waters will weaken,
so it is the only day we will be able to reach the Underwater Temple.
I wonder if they will have something rare that I have not tried yet.
I wonder who I will be able to fight.
Let us hurry up and go!
The sooner we go, the sooner we can go home, and the sooner I can see Marie.
And I can get back to flirting!
Looks like you are all set.
We are counting on you, Noelle.
I-I-I am not nervous at all!
Want To drink this so you can relax?
Why would you offer her a drink, you lush?!
Our lives are at stake here!
Well, if she is feeling pressured,
it might not work out, no matter how good she is.
But if you mess it up, I will kill you.
Honestly, what is with you people?
I feel stupid for even being nervous in the first place.
I mean, none of these guys
believe for a second that my magic will fail.
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Cradle!
Get off me, you big tub of lard!
I think I want to kill you.
I am counting on you to get us to the Underwater Temple.
We are actually moving through the ocean!
This is what it looks like inside the ocean.
Hey, get closer to the fish!
I do not have time for that!
Let me see your precious face!
The mana in the water's getting stronger.
Looks like the entrance to the strong magic region.
I-Is the mana here really weaker?
Lady Noe, you would better be able to handle this!
You are probably super scared, Magna, since you use fire.
Wh-Wh-Who are you calling scared, you jerk?!
Go, go, to the strong magic region!
We are just barely avoiding the currents...
It is as though the mana is cooperating with us.
I am going to throw up.
If you throw up in here, I will kill you, pervy woman!
There are so many creatures I have never seen before!
Looks like some of the creatures evolved a bit further because of the mana.
I wonder if it is yummy.
I wonder if its taste evolved a bit further, too.
We are going to go catch it real quick!
Do you two want to drown?!
And Grey, you do not need to mimic her glutton side, too!
We will not be able to get through like this.
All right, you are up, kid.
Go slice through it with your anti-magic sword.
You see... coming to the ocean for my first time made me realize something crazy.
Who said you need to swim?
At least give me time to get myself ready!
Your time is my time... and my time is my time.
They are just wet from the water!
You are on top of me!
Who knew there was a space like this on the ocean floor?
So this is the Underwater Temple!
There do not even seem to be any trap spells.
Do not you dare let your guard down, you bastards!
This is the strong magic region!
Does that mean there are underwater people?
Are not you guys excited to fight them?!
That would be just you, kid.
They will not suddenly attack, will they?!
Yeah, I think they definitely heard us.
Tell us about the outside world.
What kinds of missions have you done?
Leave everything to the great Charmy!
It is been about ten years since we had visitors.
I was picturing a dangerous dungeon!
Thankfully, most of the time, what you expect is not what you get.
I guess we should find someone who looks like
they know something about the magic stone.
Well, hurry up and bring out the boss of this temple.
That would probably be the high priest!
You can find the high priest right up those stairs.
Why do not we have an underwater barbecue together?
Marie is a billion times cuter.
Why do not you turn into me?
We can have that witty twin banter again.
No one's as pretty as you in the outside world.
You turned into Gordon and you are flirting?!
Crab pot, crab egg foo young, crab dumplings...
Things seem to be going really smoothly.
Is not that a good thing?
Though you are probably not satisfied if you are not almost dying all the time.
Uh, it is not like I actually enjoy almost dying all the time!
Tell the high priest hi for us!
Let us chat some more when you come back.
Is that the high priest guy?!
There is something really crazy here!
Hurry up and do something, Asta!
It might actually be the kind-hearted protector of the temple,
I will not do anything unless it attacks
What is that big creepy thing?
Looks like we have got some interesting guests!
I am the high priest here!
What is with the hyper geezer?
Those young'uns over there had some delightful reactions.
I wonder if he is yummy.
It made itself easier to eat?!
I do not know what kind of magic that was, but...
He made something that big with magic?
You guys are after the magic stone, are not you?
If you want it, why do not we play a little game?
It is probably something really dangerous.
He is calling it a game, but it is probably something that could potentially kill us!
Nobody's going to be playing that.
Do not beat on the high priest!
I think he is really important!
I think you need to know there are people in this world that you should not joke with.
Let us all respect our elders!
We do not have time to play with you.
How do you know about the magic stone, anyway?
I have pretty good eyes, you see.
You want the magic stone for your kingdom, do not you?
What do you want to do?
Send him flying and steal it?
That old guy seems like he has lots of magic, so it might be fun to fight him!
I am hearing a lot of dangerous talk over there!
Magic Knights are not allowed to do that!
There is no way that old man is normal.
I need to make sure I do not get pulled into anything troublesome.
Pardon me, but where is the food?
And you people do not intend to work at all!
Have not you made up your minds yet?
If you win the game, in addition to the magic stone,
I will gather the temple's most beautiful girls
and hold an exquisite banquet with the very best food and drink.
Is that more important than the mission?!
I will do anything from games to working out!
Okay, dial it back a bit.
This gaming expert will take you on.
You are the biggest player of them all!
Mages from the outside who made it to the Underwater Temple!
They do not look that tough.
The magic's just rolling off these guys!
Are they the warriors from the Underwater Temple?
Why do not we get started?
You have been scattered to different areas inside the temple.
So we are still inside the temple.
you will face off against the temple mages, nine-on-nine.
Come to think of it, I do not know any attack spells yet!
There should be ten of us...
If you knock out your opponent, you win.
If your opponent gives up, you win.
I think I sobered up a little.
Victory goes to the first team to wipe out the other team,
or whichever team has the most members left in the end.
I wonder who I should turn into next.
You can fight however you would like!
You can fight one-on-one or even run away.
You can find your friends and fight together, as well!
I am going to run like a bunny.
However, my nuisance spells are out there, so be careful!
That is so easy to understand!
I cannot seem to sense any magic from you.
Want To find out if I am actually a loser or not?
Sorry to call the nine of you here without warning.
Sadly, I have some bad news.
Something felt off, so I counted again, and there is one extra.
That means there is elephantly an impostor among us!
You are not a sea creature, are you?
You want the magic stone, do not you?
Black Clover, Page 43: Temple Battle Royale.
Despite how I look, I am actually the high priest!
